p: Through VirusMINT database enrichment analysis, it was observed that the targets of both the HMP bioactives and SARS-CoV-2 are also targeted by Human Immunodeficiency Virus 1 ( Fig. 8B). Additionally, human protein targets of Hepatitis C and Influenza A were also observed for the bioactive targets. Anti-viral drugs used in the treatment of these diseases are being used against SARS-CoV-2 [ 49]. This further proposes that the selected HMP bioactives can likely be used against SARS-CoV-2 and control other viral RNA infections.
